mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, Martha Washington to John Dexter, 1800 May 6
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Washington, Martha, 1731-1802
Lear, Tobias, 1762-1816
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Letter in the hand of Tobias Lear. Thanks him on Martha Washington's behalf for letter enclosing Dr. Hitchcock's oration [on death of George Washington.] which was directed sent her by Standing Committee of Order of the Cincinnati of State of R.I. Autograph letter signed, "Tobias Lear," 1 page. On reverse, addressed to 'John S. Dexter, Esp., May 6, 1800.'
